Title: Prophets
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Lucas O'Connor, Dan Dietz (story editor), Lucas O'Connor (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: On Election Day Reese shoots a potential jumper and is forced to go into counseling. The new number is for a pollster who suspects the election for Governor of New York was rigged. It was - by Samaritan, and his life is now in danger.
